mitre_attack_techniques.signature_description: Checks an internet connection is available
Queries the SIM provider numeric MCC+MNC (mobile country code + mobile network code)
Has permission to query the current location
Queries the unqiue device ID (IMEI, MEID or ESN)
May try to detect the virtual machine to hinder analysis (VM artifact strings found in memory)
Queries stored mail and application accounts (e.g. Gmail or Whatsapp)

request_headers.user-agent: Dalvik/2.1.0 (Linux; U; Android 8.1.0; Standard PC (i440FX + PIIX, 1996) Build/OPM8.190605.003)

ids_alerts.rule_msg: ET ADWARE_PUP Observed Android Fintech Related Domain (api .yumicash .com in TLS SNI)
ids_alerts.rule_raw: alert tls $HOME_NET any -> $EXTERNAL_NET any (msg:"ET ADWARE_PUP Observed Android Fintech Related Domain (api .yumicash .com in TLS SNI)"; flow:established,to_server; tls.sni; bsize:16; content:"api.yumicash.com"; fast_pattern; reference:md5,26d34aa95d7b81443d85bf3be31cf697; reference:md5,cd2e6e8e8b931cdfc928bf5e191baea3; reference:md5,9b7ab89bfd5de9e6834920c7b855f758; reference:url,www.welivesecurity.com/en/eset-research/beware-predatory-fintech-loan-sharks-use-android-apps-reach-new-depths/; classtype:pup-activity; sid:2052116; rev:1; metadata:attack_target Mobile_Client, created_at 2024_04_16, deployment Perimeter, malware_family PUP, performance_impact Low, confidence High, signature_severity Minor, updated_at 2024_04_16;)

ids_alerts.rule_msg: ET ADWARE_PUP Android Fintech Related Domain in DNS Lookup (api .yumicash .com)
ids_alerts.rule_raw: alert dns $HOME_NET any -> any any (msg:"ET ADWARE_PUP Android Fintech Related Domain in DNS Lookup (api .yumicash .com)"; dns.query; bsize:16; content:"api.yumicash.com"; nocase; reference:md5,26d34aa95d7b81443d85bf3be31cf697; reference:md5,cd2e6e8e8b931cdfc928bf5e191baea3; reference:md5,9b7ab89bfd5de9e6834920c7b855f758; reference:url,www.welivesecurity.com/en/eset-research/beware-predatory-fintech-loan-sharks-use-android-apps-reach-new-depths/; classtype:pup-activity; sid:2052113; rev:1; metadata:attack_target Mobile_Client, created_at 2024_04_16, deployment Perimeter, malware_family PUP, performance_impact Low, confidence Medium, signature_severity Minor, updated_at 2024_04_16;)

signature_matches.description: Queries the SIM provider numeric MCC+MNC (mobile country code + mobile network code)
Has permission to query the current location
Checks if phone is rooted (checks for Superuser.apk)
Queries the SIM provider name (SPN - Service Provider Name)
Has permission to read the SMS storage
Installs a new wake lock (to get activate on phone screen on)
Tries to detect the analysis device (e.g. the Android emulator)
Checks an internet connection is available
Has an unnatural receiver priority (often indicator for malware)
May check for popular installed apps
Checks if phone is rooted (checks for test-keys build tags)
Unable to instrument or execute APK, no dynamic information has been logged
Uses secure TLS version for HTTPS connections
May access the Android keyguard (lock screen)
Registers a Sensor listener (to get data about accelerometer, gyrometer etc.)
Has permission to receive SMS in the background
Lists and deletes files in the same context
Uses HTTP for connecting to the internet
Connects to IPs without corresponding DNS lookups
Has functionality to send UDP packets
Has functionalty to add an overlay to other apps
Queries stored mail and application accounts (e.g. Gmail or Whatsup)
Queries the unqiue device ID (IMEI, MEID or ESN)
Found strings which match to known social media urls
Has permission to read the phones state (phone number, device IDs, active call ect.)
URLs found in memory or binary data
May try to detect the virtual machine to hinder analysis (VM artifact strings found in memory)
Queries the unique operating system id (ANDROID_ID)

T1421.description: Checks an internet connection is available

T1430.description: Has permission to query the current location

T1426.description: Queries the unqiue device ID (IMEI, MEID or ESN)

T1409.description: Queries stored mail and application accounts (e.g. Gmail or Whatsapp)
